thread.title: LI girl hit by bullet fired from outside her home dies
thread.title_full: LI girl hit by bullet fired from outside her home dies - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: LI girl hit by bullet fired from outside her home dies
text:
HEMPSTEAD, N.Y. (AP) - Nassau County authorities say a 12-year-old girl who had been hit by a bullet fired from outside her home has died.
Police said Sunday that Dejah Joyner had been pronounced dead at Winthrop Hospital in Mineola on Saturday night.
She was shot in the head on Friday after a single bullet came through a window of her home and hit her. Police believe someone on the street in front of the house fired the shot.
Acting Nassau County District Attorney Madeline Singas called the death a "heartbreaking tragedy" and asked anyone with information to come forward to investigators.
Authorities are offering a reward of up to $75,000 for information leading to an arrest in the shooting.
